A Chance Encounter

A bustling tavern, music and laughter fill the air.  
Raskolnikov: “What am I doing here?”  

He spots Svidrigaïlov at a window, pipe in hand.  
Raskolnikov (thought): “He’s watching me… I must look away.”  

Svidrigaïlov smirks, sensing Raskolnikov’s gaze.  
Svidrigaïlov: “Well, well, come in if you want me!”  

---
Inside the tavern, tension hangs in the air.  
Raskolnikov (thought): “Why does he seem so amused?”  

Svidrigaïlov laughs, inviting him closer.  
Raskolnikov (nervously): “I… I didn’t expect to find you here.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov encounters Svidrigaïlov at a tavern, feeling a mix of terror and intrigue as their eyes meet.
